sentences.sContent: I pity anyone who has to feed a family on such a low income.
sentences.sCn: 我同情那些得依靠如此微薄的收入养活全家的人。

sentences.sContent: Sam pitied his grandmother there alone, never going out.
sentences.sCn: 萨姆很同情独自生活、从不出门的祖母。

sentences.sContent: Pity the poor teachers who have to deal with these kids.
sentences.sCn: 同情一下那几位可怜的老师吧，他们不得不和这些孩子打交道。

words.tran: 冷酷的，无情的；无同情心的
可怜地，令人怜悯地；可恨地

trans.tranCn: 可怜 n怜悯, 同情
trans.tranOther: to feel sorry for someone because they are in a very bad situation
